scripts.watch-js: watchify js/app.js -t [babelify --presets [ es2015 react] --plugins [ transform-class-properties ] ] -o build/app.js --debug --verbose
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run sass & npm run watch-js & npm run guard
scripts.build: browserify js/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react stage-1] --sourceMapRelative ../../js ] --debug | exorcist build/app.js.map > build/app.js
